articles.title: Sotheby’s to accept bitcoin, ethereum for Banksy auction - The Indian Express
articles.description: Digital artwork by American artist Mike Winkelmann, who is better known as Beeple, sold for nearly $70 million at Christie's in March, in the first-ever sale by a major auction house of a piece of art that does not exist in physical form
